name: EventManager
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores End User Data when storing the donations of a user. If a user requests data-deletion, all their donations will be removed from the bot.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EventManager. Load the cog with `[p]load eventmanager` and see all its commands with `[p]help dono` and `[p]help donoset`.
author: crayyy_zee
